fullplot: Dr. Vasi (Rajnikanth) invents a super-powered robot, Chitti, in his own image. The scientific body, AIRD, that must approve the robot, declines it based on its not having emotions and the ability to make rational judgment. A sudden flash of lightning evokes emotions in the robot, and Chitti is seemingly ready for integration into the human world. Then, Chitti falls in love with Dr. Vasi's fiancèe Sana (Aishwarya Rai) and turns on his creator.
plot: An human-android constructed by a scientist falls in love with the to-be bride of his creator.
title: Enthiran
